title: Availability 24 Hours, Recycling, European Roller Shades
posting_body: ['The Lydian', '2590 Welton St, Denver, CO, 80205', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 12', 'OR Text', '12', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'The Lydian is about style and individuality.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 605 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Although there's much to do within the steps of The Lydian, you may be tempted to stay home to enjoy your artfully appointed home surrounded by community conveniences - from coffee and co-working, to fitness and fire pits -", 'The Lydian is about style and individuality.', 'Features', '- Energy Efficient AC and Heating', '- European Roller Shades', '- Low Profile Carpet', '- Large Patios with Views!', '- 50Mb Internet Connection Included', '- Modern Plank Flooring', '- Spacious Islands with Pendant Lighting', '- Soaking Bathtubs', '- Gourmet Kitchens with 42" Tall Cabinets', '- Disposal', '- Front Load Washer & Dryer', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- White Quartz Countertops', '- Energy Star Rated Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Expansive Walk-in Closets', '- Dishwasher', '- Large Picture Windows', '- Large Walk-in Showers', 'Community Amenities', '- Recycling', '- Rooftop Pool & Lounge', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Light Rail Stop at Your Door', '- Health Club Quality Fitness Center', '- Availability 24 Hours', '- Sweeping Mountain and Downtown Views', '- Premium Package Handling', '- Convenient Underground Parking', '- Elevator', '- Luxurious Resident Lounge', '- Onsite Yoga and Group Fitness Classes', '- Outdoor Firepit & Gas Grills', '- On-Site Management', '- High Speed Internet Included', '- Controlled Building Access', '- 83 Walk Score & 98 Bike Score!', '- Bike Storage', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 12:00PM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Max 2 pets per apartment, Max weight 80 lb each, One-time Pet Fee $500.00, Rent $50.00 per month', 'Breed Restrictions: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Bull Mastiffs, Chows, Doberman Pinschers, German Shepherds, Pit Bulls, Presa Canarios, Rottweilers, Shar Peis, Siberian Huskies, Staffordshire Terriers, Wolf Hybrids or any variation or mixes of these breeds.', 'ZieniN4jL0']
